Install Notes
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1. Extract all files from the archive.
2. If you are using a modern O.S (Windows 7 or higher) please take the following install steps after extracting.
3. Right click on the game application "Sanctum of Beasts.exe" and choose "Properties".
4. Select the "Compatibility" tab and check "Run this program in compatibility mode for", choose "Windows 98 / ME".
5. Check the box "Disable visual themes", click "Apply", "Okay" and launch the game!


System Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

O.S: Windows 98 or higher
Memory: 512MB or higher
CPU: Pentium 1 or higher
Graphics: Onboard or higher
(Will run on practically any windows machine.)

About Sanctum of Beasts
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

S.o.B is a free to play Isometric MMORPG.

We have tons of features here on S.o.B, collect resources from Fishing, Mining, Woodcutting, Harvesting and
Skinning or battle challenging enemies with a vast selection of spells and weapons, craft powerful equiptment,
create a guild and recruit some members, train pets that fight for you, set bounties on players or collect wanted
players bounties in the PK zone, challenge yourself in one of our Arenas or simply come and hang out, there is 
always something to do here on Sanctum of Beasts!

Download the client and create an account, you will begin on a new people island that will explain the basics of
how to play, reach level 10 and you will gain access to the mainland.

We boast over 40 quests that players can utilize to level up, gain stats, learn spells, collect equiptment and
transportation around the world, we have scripted dungeons, towers that require defeating each floors enemies,
race changer and even an EXP vending machine!

We have a unique character race and stats system that allows players to change how their skin looks at any stage,
all races require stat points in CON to gain Health, Damage and Defence, this is to provide more bang for your
buck when allocating your stat points from leveling.

We have a great community of friendly, helpful players that are very active, every half hour a server wide event
named Devilgate begins where everyone can join a big group to battle waves of enemies in a set event location,
keep your eyes out for the Devilgate opening and type /devil into your chat to join!

For the more adventurous players you can make your way to Ozai's Arena, a challenge map that spawns every boss in
the game for you to kill, each time you defeat one the next spawns on you, if you survive them all you will find
the rewards well worth it!
